name: Tachyon's Escape
description:
Arrow Keys to move

Hold down Z to fire (Bullets move when you release or fire the maximum number of bullets, then you can fire again after all bullets are off-screen. Try to move while firing to hit a larger area)

Press X to start the game from the title screen.

You have boarded the Illusion Co. fleet's fastest ship, the Tachyon, which supposedly has the ability to go fast enough to travel back in time! However, no one has attempted until now. Keep accelerating, and avoid the fleets of drones that will try to take you down! The Tachyon's main weapon is the time blaster, which can be fired so quickly that those firing seem to be able to maneuver as if the world slowed down around them!

Made by Jonas Clermont for the Extra Credits Game Jam
